Commands.Rapid Bullets: 2-HIT ranged BRV attack  Grants 「Medium Max BRV Up」 for 3 turns  Low Action Delay
Commands.Rapid Bullets+: 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack  Grants 「Medium Max BRV Up」 for 3 turns  Low Action Delay
Commands.Reload: Resets use count of other abilities  Raises BRV based on Attack  Grants 「Trigger Happy」 for 6 turns   「Trigger Happy」 raises Attack and Speed

Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack)
Passives.Rapid Bullets Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Rapid Bullets ,  Rapid Bullets+
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Reload BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Reload
Passives.Leg Shot: Grants a low probability of inflicting  Small Speed Down  for 3 turns after using  BRV Attack
Passives.Reload Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using  Reload
Passives.Never Give Up: Prevents BREAK status if BRV is at least 50% of Max BRVBRV value remains at 1
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Rapid Bullets Extend: Rapid Bullets  use +2When using  Rapid Bullets ,  Rapid Bullets+ :- Increases the number of BRV hits by 1- Moderately raises total BRV potency- Extends the duration of buffs granted after use by 2 turns
Passives.Last Boost: Moderately raises Max BRV if HP is Max when the final battle starts
Passives.Reload Extend: When using  Reload :- Moderately raises the BRV Gain based on Attack- Extends the duration of  Trigger Happy  by 6 turns- Triggers an HP attack after useWhile  Trigger Happy  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+    Increases the number of BRV hits by 1   Moderately raises total BRV potency

Weapons.Judgment CP: 15: When using  Rapid Bullets ,  Rapid Bullets+ :- Raises BRV potency- Grants  Small Attack Up  for 1 turn
Weapons.Outsider CP: 35: Reload  use +1When using  Reload :- Raises the BRV Gain based on Attack- Lowers Action Delay- Improves the effects of  Trigger Happy  and extends its duration
